titleStmt.title: A proclamation, for adjourning the Parliament, until the seventeenth day of Apryl 1682
Proclamations. 1682-01-31
titleStmt.author: Scotland. Privy Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by the heir of Andrew Anderson, printer to His most sacred Majesty,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Edinburgh, the last day of January, one thousand six hundred and eighty two, and of Our Reign the thirty four year.
